mac.description: MAC address. This defines the MAC address of the device.

ip.description: IP address. This defines the IP address that you want to associate to a specific device.

mac.description: MAC address. This defines the MAC address of the device.

ip.description: IP address. This defines the IP address that you want to associate to a specific device.

server_relay.description: DHCP server. Specifies DHCP server's IP address, which directs any requests into server.

start_ip.description: Start IP address. Lowest leased address.

end_ip.description: End IP address. Highest leased address.

leasetime.description: Lease time. Expiry time of leased addresses.

dynamicdhcp.description: Dynamic DHCP. Dynamically allocate DHCP addresses for clients. If disabled, only   clients having static leases will be served.

force.description: Force. Force DHCP on this network even if another server is detected.

netmask.description: IPv4-Netmask. Override the netmask sent to clients. Normally it is calculated from the subnet that is served

dhcp_option.description: DHCP-Options. Define additional DHCP options, for example "6,192.168.2.1, 192.168.2.2" which advertises different DNS servers to clients

force_options.description: Force DHCP options to be sent even if it's not requested.

leasetime.description: Lease time. Expiry time of leased addresses.

dynamicdhcp.description: Dynamic DHCP. Dynamically allocate DHCP addresses for clients. If disabled, only   clients having static leases will be served.

force.description: Force. Force DHCP on this network even if another server is detected.

ra.description: Router Advertisement-Service. Specifies whether Router Advertisements should be enabled (server), relayed (relay) or disabled (disabled).

dhcpv6.description: DHCPv6-Service. Specifies whether DHCPv6 server should be enabled (server), relayed (relay), hybrid or disabled (disabled).

ndp.description: NDP-Proxy. Specifies whether NDP should be relayed (relay), hybrid or disabled (disabled)

ra_management.description:
DHCPv6-Mode. Default is Stateless + stateful.
"0" - Stateless.
"1" - Stateless + stateful.
"2" - Stateful-only.

ra_default.description: Always announce default router. Announce as default router even if no public prefix is available

server_relay.description: DHCP server. Specifies DHCP server's IP address, which directs any requests into server.

start_ip.description: Start IP address. Lowest leased address.

end_ip.description: End IP address. Highest leased address.

leasetime.description: Lease time. Expiry time of leased addresses.

dynamicdhcp.description: Dynamic DHCP. Dynamically allocate DHCP addresses for clients. If disabled, only   clients having static leases will be served.

force.description: Force. Force DHCP on this network even if another server is detected.

netmask.description: IPv4-Netmask. Override the netmask sent to clients. Normally it is calculated from the subnet that is served

dhcp_option.description: DHCP-Options. Define additional DHCP options, for example "6,192.168.2.1, 192.168.2.2" which advertises different DNS servers to clients

force_options.description: Force DHCP options to be sent even if it's not requested.

leasetime.description: Lease time. Expiry time of leased addresses.

dynamicdhcp.description: Dynamic DHCP. Dynamically allocate DHCP addresses for clients. If disabled, only   clients having static leases will be served.

force.description: Force. Force DHCP on this network even if another server is detected.

ra.description: Router Advertisement-Service. Specifies whether Router Advertisements should be enabled (server), relayed (relay) or disabled (disabled).

dhcpv6.description: DHCPv6-Service. Specifies whether DHCPv6 server should be enabled (server), relayed (relay), hybrid or disabled (disabled).

ndp.description: NDP-Proxy. Specifies whether NDP should be relayed (relay), hybrid or disabled (disabled)

ra_management.description:
DHCPv6-Mode. Default is Stateless + stateful.
"0" - Stateless.
"1" - Stateless + stateful.
"2" - Stateful-only.

ra_default.description: Always announce default router. Announce as default router even if no public prefix is available

expires.description: Amount of time left for DHCP lease to expire.
